{{also|kasse}} ==German== {{wikipedia|lang=de}} ===Etymology=== Borrowed from {{bor|de|it|cassa}}, from {{etyl|la|de}} {{m|la|capsa}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈkasə/|[ˈkʰasə]}} * {{audio|de|De-Kasse.ogg|Audio}} * {{rhymes|de|asə}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|f||Kassen}} # [[cash register]], [[cash box]] # [[cash desk]], {{lb|de|supermarket}} [[checkout]], {{lb|de|cinema|_|etc.}} [[box office]] # (Short for ''[[Krankenkasse]]'') [[health]] [[insurance]] [[institution]], [[health]] [[insurance]] [[company]] #* '''2010''', ''[[w:Der Spiegel|Der Spiegel]]'', issue [http://www.spiegel.de/spiegel/print/index-2010-24.html 24/2010], page 76: #*: Weil die Regierung keine Lösung für die Finanzmisere im Gesundheitswesen findet, droht zahlreichen '''Kassen''' der Bankrott. #*:: Because the government does not find a solution for the desperate financial situation in the health care sector, numerous health insurance institutions are threatened by bankruptcy.
